# Hypothesis Testing

Type I errors create explicit costs while type II errors create opportunity costs.

Accordingly type I errors are more psychologically painful.

# Operational Due Diligence

Examines business risk and conflict between investment objectives and fund manager business objectives. 

Management bonuses are essentially a manager's call option. This incentivizes the manager to increase volatility to increase call value.
